    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.contento.se:112586</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CFL</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">The Living Room - Words</string>
            <string language="en">The Living Room - Words</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Lebende Raum - Wörter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Salle Vivante - Mots</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Quarto Vivo - Palavras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Stanza Vivente - Parole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το καθιστικό - λέξεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Cuarto Vivo - Palabras</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">In this exercise you learn many words that have to do with furniture and other things that you usually have in a living room. Contains both sound and text.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 4 - How Do You Live?</string>
            <string language="en">In this exercise you learn many words that have to do with furniture and other things that you usually have in a living room. Contains both sound and text. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 4 - How Do You Live?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">living</string>
            <string language="sv">living room</string>
            <string language="sv">housing</string>
            <string language="sv">flat</string>
            <string language="sv">furniture</string>
            <string language="sv">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">living</string>
            <string language="en">living room</string>
            <string language="en">housing</string>
            <string language="en">flat</string>
            <string language="en">furniture</string>
            <string language="en">word knowledge</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Übung erlernen Sie viele Wörter, die 
Möbeln und anderen Sachen miteinbeziehen, die Sie normalerweise in 
einem lebenden Raum haben. Enthält Ton und Text. Safir - 
Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 4 - wie leben Sie?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cet exercice vous apprenez beaucoup de mots 
qui doivent faire avec les meubles et d'autres choses que vous avez 
habituellement dans une salle vivante. Contient le bruit et le 
texte. Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour des débutants - 
module 4 - comment vivez-vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste exercício você aprende muitas palavras 
que têm que fazer com furniture e outras coisas que você tem 
geralmente em um quarto vivo. Contem  o som e o texto. 
Safir - vida do inglês e de funcionamento para novatos - 
módulo 4 - como você vive?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa esercitazione imparate molte parole che
riguardano mobilia ed altre cose che avete solitamente in una stanza 
vivente. Contiene sia il suono che il testo. Safir - 
inglese e vita attiva per i principianti - modulo 4 - come vivete?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την άσκηση μαθαίνετε πολλές λέξεις που 
πρέπει να κάνουν με τα έπιπλα και άλλα πράγματα που έχετε 
συνήθως σε ένα καθιστικό. Περιέχει και τον ήχο και το 
κείμενο. Safir - αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για 
τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 4 - πώς ζείτε;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este ejercicio usted aprende muchas palabras 
que tengan que hacer con los muebles y otras cosas que usted tiene 
generalmente en un cuarto vivo. Contiene el sonido y el texto. 
¿Safir - inglés y vida laboral para los principiantes - módulo
4 - cómo usted vive?</string>
          </description>
